data.question: What is the purpose of incorporating Eu3+ into the lanthanide metal–organic framework?
data.answer: To improve the intrinsic white-light-emitting properties for solid-state lighting by incorporating red-emitting Eu3+.

data.question: What are the drawbacks of commercially available white-light-emitting diodes (WLEDs)?
data.answer: Poor color rendering index (CRI) and high correlated color temperature (CCT).

data.question: True or False: The emission intensity of the white-light-emitting LnMOF becomes stronger with an increase in temperature.
What is the role of NaSTP in the synthesis of the white-light-emitting LnMOF?
data.answer: NaSTP acts as a ligand that contributes to the luminescent properties of the LnMOF.

data.question: What is the observed quantum yield (QY) of the Eu3+ compound [Eu(MBDC)(STP)]?
True or False: The Eu-doped LnMOF samples show a decrease in emission efficiency with the increase of Eu3+ concentration.
What is the significance of the isostructural character of La3+ and Eu3+ compounds in the synthesis of the white-light-emitting LnMOF?
data.answer: It allows for the uniform codoping of Eu3+ into the host framework, resolving integration problems.

data.question: True or False: The white-light-emitting LnMOF material cannot be improved by doping with Eu3+.
What is the CCT range for high-quality white light illumination?
True or False: The emission spectrum of the free ligand NaSTP is identical in both solution and solid state.
What is the CRI of the 0.10% Eu-doped sample?
How does the Eu3+ doping affect the color properties of the LnMOF?
data.answer: Eu3+ doping improves the color properties by introducing a narrow-band, red emission component.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of the white-light-emitting LnMOF involves a hydrothermal reaction.
What is the role of the ligand MBDC in the Eu3+ compound?
data.answer: MBDC acts as an ancillary ligand that increases the observed lifetime and efficiency of energy transfer.

data.question: True or False: The white-light-emitting LnMOF has a 2D planar structure.
What is the CCT of the pure La3+ compound?
True or False: The emission intensity of the white-light-emitting LnMOF is unaffected by temperature changes.
What is the significance of the p–p attractions between the parallel ligands STP in the LnMOF?
data.answer: They contribute to the luminescent properties and structural stability of the LnMOF.

data.question: What is the quantum yield (QY) of the 0.10% Eu-doped sample measured under an excitation of 390 nm?
True or False: The intrinsic white-light-emitting properties of the LnMOF cannot be improved by doping.
